pkgmetadata.longdescription: ProcMeter3 is a fast, flexible, modular system monitor application that can display system stats onscreen using GTK2 or Athena widgets, display stats on a separate LCD device compatible with app-misc/lcdproc, or simply log stats to a file. Multiple output versions can be built and run together on the same system. By default, the Athena widgets version (procmeter3-xaw) is built.

use.flag: Also build the procmeter3-gtk2 binary, which uses GTK+-2.x widgets to display output.
Also build the procmeter3-lcd binary, which displays output using a small LCD device compatible with LCDproc (requires app-misc/lcdproc).
Also build the procmeter3-log binary, which writes output to a log file.
